product_name: Kurgo Auto Zip Line Leash Combo
long_description: The Kurgo Auto Zip Line(TM) Leash Combo keeps finicky Fidos comfortably restrained in the backseat, so they-and you-can enjoy the drive. Inspired by a dog run, the sturdy nylon Auto Zip Line allows for back and forth plus sit and stand movement, while providing security for sudden stops. Package includes zip line and leash/tether that work in conjunction with harness (sold separately) to offer an instant transition from vehicle restraint to walking lead. Restraint system ensures dogs cannot jump out of car, even when door is opened. Kurgo Auto Zip Line is compatible with all vehicle seatbelts, and can be used between any two fixed points inside the vehicle.
short_description: The Kurgo Auto Zip Line(TM) Leash Combo keeps finicky Fidos comfortably restrained in the backseat, so they-and you-can enjoy the drive.
